zh: 史密斯先生来了。

en: Mr. Smith has come.
zh: 史密斯先生已经来了。

en: Mr. Smith spoke so quickly that I couldn't catch what he said.
zh: 史密斯先生说话太快了，我没听清他说什么。

en: I like playing sports.
zh: 我喜欢做运动。

en: I like sports.
zh: 我喜欢运动。

en: Everything went back in place.
zh: 一切都恢复原位了。

en: It is not the case that every piece of reading matter is worth reading.
zh: 并非所有的读物都值得阅读。

en: All roads lead to Rome.
zh: 条条大路通罗马。

en: We are equal in the eyes of the law.
zh: 在法律面前人人平等。

en: Everyone is equal before the law.
zh: 法律面前人人平等。

en: All men want money.
zh: 所有人都想要钱。

en: All members need to observe these rules.
zh: 所有成员都需要遵守这些规则。

en: It's necessary for all members to follow these rules.
zh: 所有成员都必须遵守这些规则。
